Metadata.title: Target Master
Metadata.description: Track your performance and get AI-powered insights.

Dashboard.title: Main Dashboard
Dashboard.repRankingsDescription: Rankings based on an equal share of shop targets.

DetailedDashboard.title: Shop Dashboard
DetailedDashboard.dailyContributionSummary: A summary of daily contributions to your monthly performance goals.
DetailedDashboard.individualPerformance: Individual monthly performance based on an equal share of targets.
DetailedDashboard.noData: No data available for this shop.

Dialogs.setTargetsDescription: Define your goals for each performance metric.
Dialogs.editAchievementsDescription: Manually set the total achieved for each metric for the month.
Dialogs.aiAssistantDescription: Here is an AI-powered analysis of your recent performance and suggestions for improvement.
Dialogs.manageShopsDescription: Add, edit, or remove your shop locations and their sales representatives.
Dialogs.shopDescriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of the shop.
Dialogs.newShopDescriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of the new shop.
Dialogs.deleteConfirmationDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the shop and all of its associated data.
